title: Therapeutic effect of fenugreek supplementation on type 2 diabetes mellitus: A systematic review and meta-analysis of clinical trials
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Mahdi Vajdi, Nooshin Noshadi, Atefeh Bonyadian, Sahar Golpour-Hamedani, Beitullah Alipour, Fatemeh Pourteymour Fard Tabrizi, Mahdieh Abbasalizad-Farhangi, Gholamreza Askari
